snippet: The Justice Department is rightly calling for reforms at the jail complex after an investigation found that teenagers faced excessive force over minor infractions.
abstract: Editorial praises Justice Dept report on culture of violence against teenagers at Rikers Island for recommending that all adolescents be removed from jail complex altogether; underscores importance of report's call for complete reform of institutional culture of jail system to ensure that such violence is no longer tolerated.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department is rightly calling for reforms at the jail complex after an investigation found that teenagers faced excessive force over minor infractions.

headline.main: A ‘Culture of Violence’ at Rikers Island
headline.print_headline: A ‘Culture of Violence’ at Rikers Island
